text: was a Japanese artist of manga. He was known as the Gag Manga King. He won the Shogakukan Manga Award in 1964 for Osomatsu-kun and the Bungeishunjū Manga Award in 1971 for Tensai Bakabon. In April 2002 he was hospitalized for a subdural hematoma and was in a coma from 2004 until his death.Kenichi Nagira Fanclub bulletin On August 2, 2008, he died of pneumonia at a hospital in Bunkyō, Tokyo. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Deaths from subdural hematoma Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Japanese manga artists
title: Fujio Akatsuka
